application.name: NEMO-3D / WIGLAF
application.desc: This application reads in and outputs an XML-formatted input file for NEMO-3D.

param.name: Read from File
param.desc: only NULL (i.e. do NOT read structure info of first shape from file) is implemented)

param.name: include tilt angle in a quantum well?
param.desc: hkl defined below, describe the direction of the tilt: hkl=1 0 0 means no tilt and 28 0 1 means a ~2-DEG tilt in plane XZ with respect to a_z

param.name: NaddALY
param.desc: # of additional layers to include in y-direction: use this option if you want to describe an structure with a fraction of the unit cell, which would be measured in units of eg. a_y/4 for Zincblende

param.name: NaddALZ
param.desc: # of additional layers to include in z-direction

param.name: Has Cell Granularity?
param.desc: does this shape have cell granularity?

param.name: Strain AND Electronic Calculation?
param.desc: also use this shape for electronic calculation

param.name: Mark as a subdomain
param.desc: mark this for future use by local bandstructure calculation

param.name: Modify species
param.desc: set species within this shape according to Mat, Mol, and Pol

param.name: Fixed Concentration?
param.desc: specify alloy concentration with absolute certainty

param.name: Internal variable 1
param.desc: You should not be seeing this.

param.name: Has Cell Granularity?
param.desc: does this shape have cell granularity?

param.name: Strain AND Electronic Calculation?
param.desc: also use this shape for electronic calculation

param.name: Mark as a subdomain
param.desc: mark this for future use by local bandstructure calculation

param.name: Modify species
param.desc: modify species within this shape as described below

param.name: Fixed Concentration?
param.desc: specify alloy concentration with absolute certainty

param.name: Internal variable 1
param.desc: You should not be seeing this.

param.name: Strain dependence of VFF
param.desc: Parameters describing strain dependence of VFF constants

param.name: M_atom
param.desc: Mass of atomic species in 10^-26 kg

param.name: M_atom
param.desc: Mass of atomic species in 10^-26 kg

param.name: alpha (Keating)
param.desc: The set of values for alpha and beta chosen because they correspond most closely to the elastic constants used in nemo [see Chen/Sher p.47]

param.name: beta (Keating)
param.desc: The set of values for alpha and beta chosen because they correspond most closely to the elastic constants used in nemo [see Chen/Sher p.47]

param.desc: Mass of atomic species in 10^-26 kg

param.desc: The set of values for alpha and beta chosen because they correspond most closely to the elastic constants used in nemo [see Chen/Sher p.47]

param.desc: The set of values for alpha and beta chosen because they correspond most closely to the elastic constants used in nemo [see Chen/Sher p.47]

param.desc: Parameters describing strain dependence of VFF constants

param.name: M_atom
param.desc: Mass of atomic species in 10^-26 kg

param.name: alpha (Keating)
param.desc: Obtained from linear interpolation of elastic stiffness coefficients and lattice constant for Si and Ge

param.desc: The set of values for alpha and beta chosen because they correspond most closely to the elastic constants used in nemo [see Chen/Sher p.47]

param.name: Strain dependence of VFF
param.desc: Parameters describing strain dependence of VFF constants

param.name: M_atom
param.desc: Mass of atomic species in 10^-26 kg

param.name: Gauge choice for Bfield
param.desc: Gauge for the magnetic field, 'Symmetric' gives A = (-By/2,Bx/2,0), 'Asymmetric_x' gives A = (0,Bx,0) useful with Efield along x, 'Asymmetric_y' gives A = (-By,0,0), useful with Efield along y

param.name: Number of impurities?
param.desc: Number of P+ donors in the system (max.3)

param.name: Coords. of impurities. Needed x1,y1,z1, x2,y2,z2,...,xN,yN,zN with N=ImpNumber
imp_model
param.desc: Use 1 to include U0 only, 2 includes also Si:P parameters

param.name: Surface Passivation
param.desc: method by which oribitals of surface atoms couple to vacuum

param.name: Dangling Bond Shift
param.desc: energy shift for dangling bonds on the surface (eV)

param.name: s orbital shift
param.desc: s-orbital energy shift of surface atom

param.name: p-orbital shift
param.desc: p orbital energy shift of surface atom

param.name: d-orbital shift
param.desc: d orbital energy shift of surface atom

param.name: s*-orbital shift
param.desc: s* orbital energy shift of surface atom

param.name: Strain-dependent hamiltonian?
param.desc: make H matrix elements distance dependent?

group.name: Modifications to geometry
group.desc: Modifications to geometry of input (or computed) structure

param.name: Homogenize surface?
param.desc: Remove anions (or Ge) from the surface

param.name: Remove single bonds?
param.desc: Remove surface atoms with only one bond

param.name: Hamiltonian Size
param.desc: compute electronic strucure of whole structure or of single cell

param.name: Efficiency
param.desc: should hamiltonian be stored for high speed or small memory?

param.name: conv_vec_method
param.desc: If conv_method=2: 1 for ALL components and 2 for selected comps.

param.name: Valence band energy range
param.desc: Search range for valence band eigenvalues

param.name: Conduction band energy range
param.desc: Search range for conduction band eigenvalues

param.name: Start Convergence Check
param.desc: first iteration number to check for convergence

param.name: Max number of iterations w/o eigval
param.desc: maximum number of iterations without a converged eigenvalue

param.name: BL_size
param.desc: number of vectors in a block for each iteration:gives deg.

param.name: Deflation
param.desc: check for deflation at each iteration step

param.name: DefTolerance
param.desc: vector discarded if its norm is less than DefTolerance

param.name: Max_no_success
param.desc: stop if no eigenvalues found in Max_no_success iterations

param.name: num_cb
param.desc: if Eig_dump=true, number of CB eigenvalues to be dumped

param.name: num_vb
param.desc: if Eig_dump=true, number of VB eigenvalues to be dumped

param.name: conv_vec_method
param.desc: If conv_method=2: 1 for ALL components and 2 for selected comps.

param.name: Valence band energy range
param.desc: Search range for valence band eigenvalues

param.name: Conduction band energy range
param.desc: Search range for conduction band eigenvalues

param.name: Start Convergence Check
param.desc: first iteration number to check for convergence

param.name: Max number of iterations w/o eigval
param.desc: maximum number of iterations without a converged eigenvalue

param.name: number of Arnoldi vectors
param.desc: How many times of the number of eigenvalues is the number of Arnoldi vectors?

param.name: Interval in which the eigenvalues are wanted
param.desc: Interval [a,b] in which the eigenvalues are wanted

param.name: Interval that includes all eigenvalues
param.desc: Interval [c,d], which includes all eigenvalues in it

param.name: degree of Chebyshev polynomial to be used
|Psi(r)|^2
param.desc: write modulus squared of the wavefunctions to file

param.name: |Psi(cell)|^2
param.desc: write modulus squared of the wavefunctions to file (but averaged over a unit cell)

param.name: Visualization_3D
param.desc: write output files of dx-format for 3D visualization

param.name: Save tridiagonal matrix
param.desc: Save the matrix generated by the Lanczos 3-term recursion

param.name: Trace of eigenvalues
param.desc: Save a log of the computed Ritz values generated by the Lanczos algorithm

param.name: Rayleigh-Ritz iteration log
param.desc: used for logging progress of rayleigh-ritz

param.name: Local Ham
param.desc: Dump the non-zero entries of the Hamiltonian for the local bandstructure computation

param.name: Update lattice constants before strain calculation?
param.desc: update lattice constants before strain calculation?

param.name: If UpdateLatt is true, what are the new lattice constants?
param.desc: If UpdateLatt is true, what are the new lattice constants?

param.name: What is the scaling factor for dE/da?
param.desc: What is the scaling factor (S) for dE/da? Use number between 1e-2 to 1e-5 depending on the number of atoms (N) in strain calculation. An ideal S is about 1.0/sqrt(N).

param.name: output strain from the electronic domain only?
output file for tension
param.desc: write output files of six tension components for visualization

group.name: Phonon calcuation
group.desc: Input parameters for the phonon calculation.

param.name: Phonon model
param.desc: Valence-field force model or include Coulomb

param.name: minimal q_ph nm^{-1}
param.desc: Initial value of phonon wave vector

param.name: maximal q_ph nm^{-1}
param.desc: Final value of phonon wave vector

param.name: Number of q_ph points
param.desc: Number of points in quasi-Brillouin zone for phonon wave vector

param.name: Part of the phonon spectrum
param.desc: What part of the phonon spectrum to compute?

param.name: Optimization of the anharmonicity corrections
param.desc: By default the Lower part of the phonon spectrum computes with the same set of anharmonicity corrections as that used for strain calculations (first 3 values of strain_VFF), while the Higher part of the phonon spectrum computes with the set of anharmonicity corrections optimised for the optical phonons in Gamma point (second 3 values of strain_VFF)

param.name: Number of phonon branches
param.desc: Number of phonon branches to be searched with ARPACK/PARPACK

param.name: number of Arnoldi vectors
param.desc: How many times of the number of eigenvalues is the number of Arnoldi vectors?

param.name: number of Arnoldi vectors
param.desc: How many times of the number of eigenvalues is the number of Arnoldi vectors?

param.name: Dump atomic positions at equil.? NOTE: need also PsiSqr set to true
RunFile
param.desc: Dump results of XML parser to file?

file.name: Function Text
file.desc: The file contains the X-Y sine plot produced by the application.

file.name: Function Plot
file.desc: The file contains the X-Y sine plot produced by the application.
